Gbemisola Ruqayyah Saraki (amụrụ ya na  ubochi nke atọ n' ọnwa nke ise (Mee ) n'afọ1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nke jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mba maka Mmanụ na Mmepe Steel nke Naijiria kemgbe ubochi nke isii n' ọnwa Julaị  n'afọ 2022. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'oge gara aga dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka njem njem site n' afọ 2019 ruo mgbe Onye isi ala kpọgara ya na Mines na Steel Development n'afọ 2022. Onye bụbu onye omeiwu, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Kwara Central Senatorial District n'afọ 2003 n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke People's Democratic Party. A họpụtara ya n'ime House of Representatives n'afọ1999 na-anọchite anya Asa / Iloin West Federal Constituency, Kwara State. Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị onye bụbu onye isi oche Senate nke Naịjirịa (8th Assembly), Bukola Saraki.
